name: Dennis Prager Game

Dennis Prager on Let's Talk Weed has a special message for the rest of us... 'Friends, The Pentagon recently released a list of marijuana users who need to be stopped before they get the full effect of the drug. The signers also included Dr. William C. Harris,who has been banned from medical marijuana research in the United States. And of course, Dr. Carl Hartman, who has prescribed marijuana to a cancer patient. Now, it's not clear exactly what Dennis Prager (My dear friend and Dr. William C. Harris) is going to do. Are his notes about marijuana really so badly scrambled that he is essentially "asshole" or can he understand and quite honestly, some one? We expect he will try to help us through this difficult time together
